item.title: First Meetup «Let's Talk Data Science With R !!!»
item.description: Les’t Talk Data Science with R !!! <<<<<<< HEAD During the first meeting of the Algiers R user group, entitled; «Let’s Talk Data Science With R» organised 14th August, 2020 Mohamed El Fodil Ihadadden introduced the Algiers R user group to the audience, then he gave a brief introduction to his batata package, as a first presentation. Then, The second presentation was hosted by Nassim Kaddour, he gave us an introduction to the dash package on R, an alternative to shiny.
